Item.name: Ration Stamp A
Item.description: A ration card issued by the Coalition to be used in Vending Machines to obtain a Protein Bar.

Item.name: Ration Stamp B
Item.description: A ration card issued by the Coalition to be used in Vending Machines to obtain a bags of Chips.

Item.name: Ration Stamp C
Item.description: A ration card issued by the Coalition to be used in Vending Machines to obtain an Energy Drink.

Item.description: A ration card issued by the Coalition to be used in Vending Machines to obtain a bar of Chocolate.

Item.name: Ration Stamp E
Item.description: A ration card issued by the Coalition to be used in Vending Machines to obtain a single cigarette.

Item.name: Shiv
Item.description: Used to butter bread if your knife breaks

Item.name: Vodka with rag
Item.description: Someone fucked up a molotov.

Item.name: Copper Coil
Item.description: Weak handcuffs that will break over time, make sure to tie it tightly so that it will make prisoners walk slowly to avoid falling over, really uesful if you have a runner

Item.name: Hot Can
Item.description: A scuffed bomb igniter (or a make shift flare) made by mildly upset crewmates, be careful with this or you might blow yourself up.
